name: Color Day - Paint by number
description:
Color Day is a decompress game with coloring by numbers. Coloring is so peaceful and restful that you can color anytime, anywhere, even when you only have a few free minutes.You can come here when you encounter pressure and can't relieve yourself. When you quietly enjoy the fun of painting games, time flies and your troubles will disappear.


Here is a dream garden for you. There are creative and unique exquisite paintings waiting for you to create. You can choose your favorite art works , and fill in colors according to the numbers to complete pictures. Coloring can not only help you kill time, but also enable you to release your internal artistic inspiration. All you need to do is to put all kinds of colors on the corresponding areas in numerical order, and you can get masterpieces of your own without having superb painting skills.


Features
- Variety of Colorful Images. Various coloring pages in different categories including Mandala, flowers, animals, nature, character & etc. As long as you choose the category, there are thousands of pictures waiting for you to color.
- New pictures updated everyday. We will provide you different coloring pages and update pictures every day to keep you fresh.We'll also update unique themes when festivals come,such as Halloween theme, Thanksgiving theme, Christmas theme, and so on.
- Easy to paint by number. You just need to fill in the gray area according to the color number, fill in the color one by one, and a masterpiece will be completed. You also can use tips to help you when you get stuck in the color game.
- Share your works. You can share your finished paintings with your friends or post them on social networks.


Discover and color 10,000+ free pictures. Now download Color Day and we will bring you an unparalleled coloring experience!
